Compare HB GG and Brush

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
GG <- read_csv("GribbleGapExample.csv")
HB <- read_csv("WS3HBEF_Example.csv")
BM <- read_csv("MDH_Beast_AllChem_Apr22.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_smooth(data = BM, 
    mapping = aes(x = Si_ppb / 1000, y = Ca_ppb / 1000, color = "BM"), method = "lm")+
  geom_smooth(data = HB, 
    mapping = aes(x = SiO2_mgL, y = Ca_mgL, color = "HB"), method = "lm")+
  geom_smooth(data = GG, 
    mapping = aes(x = Si_E3, y = Ca_E3, color = "GG"), method = "lm")
```
